oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio I: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this part of program (2 projects) is to evaluate the environmental risk through ecologic indicators (adaptation of these indicators to Organic farming), and to study the impact of Organic farming on subsoil water (nitric waste).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Agribio I: Environmental aspects. Runs 2001 - 2003. Programme Leader(s): Cluzeau, Daniel and Beno√Æt, Marc.
